      • createBufferParams

        public BufferParam createBufferParams(int w,
                                      int h,
                                      int bandCount,
                                      int dataType,
                                      boolean malloc)
        Description copied from interface: BufferFactory
        Creates a parameter object for building a buffer. The buffer type is read-write. This type could be changed after the creation of a BufferParam object. The buffer will be cached if it's necessary
        Specified by:
        createBufferParams in interface BufferFactory
        Parameters:
        w - Width
        h - Height
        bandCount - Number of bands
        dataType - Type of data

      • createMemoryBufferParams

        public BufferParam createMemoryBufferParams(int w,
                                            int h,
                                            int bandCount,
                                            int dataType,
                                            boolean malloc)
        Description copied from interface: BufferFactory
        Creates a parameter object for building a buffer. The buffer type is read-write. This type could be changed after the creation of a BufferParam object. The buffer will be stored in memory.
        Specified by:
        createMemoryBufferParams in interface BufferFactory
        Parameters:
        w - Width
        h - Height
        bandCount - Number of bands
        dataType - Type of data

      • createReadOnlyBufferParams

                                              int miny,
                                              int maxx,
                                              int maxy,
                                              BandList bandList)
        Description copied from interface: BufferFactory
        Creates a parameter object for building a buffer. For this call the buffer type is read-only.
